subject: WORLD BANK GROUP
body:
WORLD BANK GROUP
Washington DC.
Confidential mail.
PAYMENT 2023.
Attention: 
This is World Bank Group Washington DC together with the American First Credit Union; we wish to inform you that you have been verified for the refund of your contract payment.
Your name was mentioned as one of the Scam victims, so we have mapped out $45musd for you, based on the United Nations refund committee resolution.
The UN also has given instruction to remit your fund through the below bank once you are able to comply with our directives.
Your fund will be remitted to you through our affiliated Bank (Allied Investment Bank)
But your document was signed by someone who claims to be your next of kin. We expect to hear from you immediately as Mr. Santos William, who claims to be your representative, has sent an account details:
VARO BANK
ACCOUNT NUMBER 32088864
ROUTING NUMBER 124303201
He also reported that you died of Covid-19 last year, advising us to release your payment to him.
If you're still alive please kindly reconfirm your name, banking details, contact phone number, address together with your id. On this email:  (
worldbankwc@currently.com
)

subject: Re:   WORLD BANK GROUP
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprising piece of news! I wasn't aware that my name was mentioned as one of the scam victims. Could you please provide more details about this situation? 

You mentioned someone named Mr. Santos William who claims to be my next of kin and has provided account details. I'm not familiar with this person. Can you tell me more about how he is connected to me?

Also, it's quite alarming to hear that someone reported my death last year! Rest assured, I am very much alive and well.

I appreciate your efforts in trying to remit my fund through Allied Investment Bank. However, before we proceed further, could you please explain the process in detail? What are the steps involved and what kind of compliance do you need from me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kevin

subject: Re:  WORLD BANK GROUP
body:
Attention.
We are glad to hear from you Kevin, it is so bad that someone is trying to claim your fund.We will report the matter to the FBI. And Thanks for your prompt response, you have to  forward your details to us right away.
Thanks for understanding looking forward to your response.

Sent from AT&T Yahoo Mail for iPhone

subject: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Sir Your response is needed.


Sent from AT&T Yahoo Mail for iPhone

subject: Re: WORLD BANK GROUP
body:
Hello KevinHow are you doing today we have been expecting your response until now.


Sent from AT&T Yahoo Mail for iPhone
